meanings.definition: The action or process of classifying something.
meanings.sent1: Her classifications of animals helped her organize the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The library uses classifications to sort books by genre.
meanings.sent3: The detective's classifications of suspects led to a surprising revelation.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her unique classifications of styles set her apart.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's classifications of plants were so detailed, they amazed her colleagues.

meanings.definition: A category into which something is put.
meanings.sent1: The store's classifications of products made shopping easier for customers.
meanings.sent2: In the competition, each team fell into different classifications based on skill level.
meanings.sent3: The classifications of desserts at the buffet tempted everyone to try a little of everything.
meanings.sent4: His classifications of music genres were as diverse as his taste in songs.
meanings.sent5: The classifications of clouds in the sky fascinated the young meteorologist.
